txt.en: You have acquired a musical instrument.  You can play music by typing '/music' with your instrument equipped.  Your 1-0 shortcut keys will be transformed into musical notes, like a keyboard.  CTRL and SHIFT will raise and lower an octave while playing.

You have acquired a musical instrument. You can play music by typing '/music' with your instrument equipped. Your 1-0 shortcut keys will be transformed into musical notes, like a keyboard. CTRL and SHIFT will raise and lower an octave while playing.
